title: Dr. Leon Eisenberg: ADHD Is a ‘Fictitious Disease’?
subtitle: Rumor: Dr. Leon Eisenberg, the 'father' of ADHD, said just before his death that ADHD 'is a prime example of a fictitious disease.'
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Dr. Leon Eisenberg, the ‘father’ of ADHD, said just before his death that ADHD ‘is a prime example of a fictitious disease.’
